#summary Integrity is part of the AntiCultureWorld project.

Integrity is a [NeedStat need].

==When too low==
The [Entity entity]'s [Integrity integrity] is decreased

==When too high==
  * The [Entity entity]'s [Integrity integrity] is decreased
=== Possible effects we could implement ===
  * The [Entity entity]'s [Sleep sleep] stat is decreased (would make it more likely to sleep)
  * The [Entity entity] could be slowed down
  * The [Entity entity] could be lazy

==When is it decreased?==
  * With time
  * When the [Entity entity] vomits
  * When the [Entity entity] defecates

==When is it increased?==
When the [Entity entity] eats something with [Nutrition] properties > 0
